entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bella Bella
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:15 PM PST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bella Bella Airport 11:00 PM PST Friday 10 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: -3.3°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind light except northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 through mainland inlets and valleys. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the morning. A few showers beginning near noon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except northeast 50 gusting to 70 through mainland inlets and valleys. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to periods of snow in the evening. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except northeast 50 gusting to 70 through mainland inlets and valleys. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 10 March 2023
